activities: Leading Indicator Systems implements assessment projects/service offerings on behalf of Clients. We either manage full projects or provide Client access to cloud-based, SaaS solutions for self-service use. LIS processes and stores personal data, whether loaded directly by Clients or transferred to LIS for loading into an LIS software solutions. Such personal data is compiled and owned by Clients and utilized for implementing projects/service offerings, producing reports and/or analyzing assessment results. LIS has no direct relationship with the individuals whose personal data is processed and reported pursuant to assessments.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Services - (CSV)Information Services - (INF)Education & Training - (EDS)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
personaldata: Names and/or email address of Client employees invited to participate in an assessment project. LIS processing of such data  is automated.
recoursemech: Unresolved complaints are handled by the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR program, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus.
